  <description>

      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_f7b39685c7115392e03d2f15cba7d1f50b5f61e7</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_f7b39685c7115392e03d2f15cba7d1f50b5f61e7</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Force-separation curve between a pair of atoms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraft-Trennung Kurve zwischen einem Paar Atomen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">courbe de Force-séparation entre une paire 
d'atomes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">curva da Força-separação entre um par dos 
átomos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">curva di Forza-separazione fra un accoppiamento 
degli atomi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καμπύλη δύναμη-χωρισμού μεταξύ ενός ζευγαριού των 
ατόμων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">curva de la Fuerza-separacio'n entre un par de 
átomos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This line graph shows the relationship between the attractive component and repulsive component of the force between a pair of atoms and their separation distance. This can be used in constructing the resultant force-separation curve.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">attractive force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">line graph</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">repulsive force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">resultant force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">separation distance</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Zeile Diagramm zeigt das Verhältnis 
zwischen dem attraktiven Bestandteil und repulsive Bestandteil der 
Kraft zwischen einem Paar Atomen und ihrem Trennungabstand. 
Dieses kann verwendet werden, wenn man die resultierende 
Kraft-Trennung Kurve konstruiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce graphe par ligne montre le rapport entre le 
composant attrayant et le composant répulsif de la force entre une 
paire d'atomes et leur distance de séparation. Ceci peut être 
utilisé en construisant la courbe résultante de force-séparation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta linha gráfico mostra o relacionamento entre
o componente atrativo e o componente repulsive da força entre um par 
dos átomos e sua distância da separação. Isto pode ser usado
em construir a curva resultante da força-separação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico lineare mostra il rapporto fra il 
componente attraente ed il componente repulsive della forza fra un 
accoppiamento degli atomi e la loro distanza di separazione. 
Ciò può essere usata nella costruzione della curva risultante 
di forza-separazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση γραμμών εμφανίζει τη σχέση 
μεταξύ του ελκυστικού συστατικού και του αποκρουστικού συστατικού
της δύναμης μεταξύ ενός ζευγαριού των ατόμων και της απόστασης 
χωρισμού τους. Αυτό μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί στην κατασκευή
της επακόλουθης καμπύλης δύναμη-χωρισμού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta línea gráfico muestra el lazo entre el 
componente atractivo y el componente repulsive de la fuerza entre un 
par de átomos y su distancia de la separación. Esto puede ser 
utilizada en construir la curva resultante de la fuerza-separacio'n.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">attraktive Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeile Diagramm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">repulsive Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">resultierende Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trennungabstand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">force attrayante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">graphe par ligne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">force répulsive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">force résultante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">distance de séparation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">força atrativa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">linha gráfico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">força repulsive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">força resultante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">distância da separação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">forza attraente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">grafico lineare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">forza repulsive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">forza risultante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">distanza di separazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ελκυστική δύναμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραφική παράσταση γραμμών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αποκρουστική δύναμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επακόλουθη δύναμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">απόσταση χωρισμού</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fuerza atractiva</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">línea gráfico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fuerza repulsive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fuerza resultante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">distancia de la separación</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
